nodes.text: Siege of an Imperial Galactic Rim shipyard
The Siege of an Imperial Galactic Rim shipyard took place in 11 ABY, at the height of Operation Shadow Hand.
The battle involved a massive New Republic force besieging a great Imperial shipyard located in the Galactic Rim.

The troopship Pelagia was scheduled to rendezvous with an X-wing flight group based in the Ottega system and then proceed to aid the invasion force. The ship and its passengers was destroyed when it was hit by a missile shot from the Galaxy Gun, and the outcome of the battle it would have participated at is unknown.
